WorkItem.Description:
Hoping I'm not double-posting, but searching Discussions and Issues with "moonkin," "T11" and "Regalia" turned up nothing on the issue I seem to be experiencing.
 
There appears to be no DPS value associated with the two-piece set bonus for moonkin T11. The four-piece set bonus shows a distinct DPS gain, both in looking at the value of the fourth piece and when looking at the Buffs: Set Bonuses tab. The two-piece shows 0 value on the Set Bonuses tab, and no discernible gain on the Gear tab.
 
I figure three possibilities: I'm missing something (quite possible), 5% crit to moonkin DoTs is of no effect on our DPS (which I find unlikely), or there's an issue to be fixed. Would love to know which if any of these are correct.

Comments.Message:
Same issue for me.

The Balance thread on elitist jerks seems to imply that the 2 piece bonus is 'pretty good', so I think we can rule out option 2, which means either we are missing something or it isn't implemented.
